/-!
Let Ï† : P â†’ Q be a smooth map of manifolds with dim P < dim Q. Show that the image Ï†(P) is nowhere dense in Q.

The statement is recorded below; the proof is omitted (``sorry'').

then the image of Ï† is nowhere dense in Q (equivalently, the interior of its
